remarks: Virtual deduction proof of ~ en3lplem1 .  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 24-Oct-2011.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
en3lplem1VD $p |- ( ( A e. B /\ B e. C /\ C e. A ) -> ( x = A -> E. y ( y e. { A , B , C } /\ y e. x ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
